output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - CMF 11240002 is present at the end of the post
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - Explicitly mentions Nicolae Ciucă, who is one of the presidential candidates (Position 4)
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - Uses inclusive language ("Împreună", "putem construi") - Addresses the general public with calls to action
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Explicitly promotes PNL candidates for Parliament - Directly promotes Nicolae Ciucă for presidential elections - Contains clear electoral messaging ("votul pentru PNL") - Uses electoral slogans and hashtags
5. Journalism: No - This is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content - Contains partisan messaging and direct electoral advocacy
6. Personal opinion: No - This is an official party communication (has CMF) - Structured as campaign material - Paid advertisement from a party representative
The post contains two distinct electoral messages: 1. Parliamentary elections (which is allowed) 2. Presidential election promotion (which is not allowed after campaign period)

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Directly promotes a presidential candidate - Is a paid advertisement - Has clear electoral messaging - Combines parliamentary (allowed) with presidential (not allowed) propaganda
conclusion.message-for-police: Ucu Dima și Partidul Național Liberal, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj electoral platit pe Facebook (ID: 1290694521930956) după încheierea perioadei de campanie electorală pentru alegerile prezidențiale. Postarea, difuzată după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, conține propagandă electorală explicită pentru candidatul prezidențial Nicolae Ciucă, descriindu-l ca "lider de excepție" și "alegerea ideală pentru funcția de Președinte al României". Mesajul este confirmat ca fiind propagandă electorală prin prezența codului CMF 11240002, reprezintă o încălcare clară a prevederilor legale privind încetarea campaniei electorale.
